title: 14-Year-Old in Critical Condition After Being Shot in Head
content:
DES MOINES, Iowa -- Police say a teenager is in critical condition after being shot in the head Monday night.
At approximately 6:15 p.m., Des Moines Police Department patrol officers responded to Iowa Methodist Medical Center to investigate a report of a shooting. Hospital officials reported that a shooting victim had arrived at the Emergency Room via private vehicle.
The responding officers found a 14-year-old victim being treated for a gunshot wound to the head. The victim is described as being in critical condition with medical treatment ongoing.
A potential crime scene was located in the 1100 block of Keo Way, with damage to a nearby building.
Des Moines Police Department detectives and Des Moines police are investigating this incident.
